column5: Click on the video that shows a bloody head
Seen that a while back.  Buddy gets messed up pretty bad.  He's got to have a bad cuncusion.  Or worse, no??
Oh man Id think a fractured skull but who knows???  I wish him well but for the slingshot he built and his aim youde think he knew better???  That could have easily killed him
weird thing is....look at the guys shirt...looks like he's already covered in blood before it happens! Not the first time buddy beaned himself methinks. He bleeds good though, I give him credit.
lol pretty sure that blood on his shirt is just a design...still hilarious though...i wish it showed the slow motion cam to show exactly what caused it to ricochet so bad.

That's gonna leave a mark. The guy obviously put some time and thought into the slingshot and camera/light set-up...did he not take into account the possibility of ricochet's??? He's using steel ball bearings and the back stop doesnt look too soft. I guess he learned the hard way! Better his skull than his eye.
Famous last words "so it's a very safe sling shot"
Im more impressed now lol.  They made that look absolutely real!  I was sold hook line and sinker
Same here! I was sold. Cringed at the site...... Things you can do with a pc! Amazing.
